name: Flea!
description:
Flea was designed for the NES and dose run on an actual NES But is now on Steam!

Flea is a challenging 2D platformer with an intriguing back story. Play as Henry the Hyperactive Flea who just can’t stop jumping! Navigate the beasts and collect blood to get the heart of the problems.

  • Explore 80 levels
  • Meet weird characters
  • Discover secrets.

This game was funded with Kickstarter this leap year!
